participant_1.name: Ethan Sterling
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and driven, always seeking the next big opportunity. He has a competitive edge and believes in the value of hard work.
participant_1.background: my parents are very wealthy bankers. i graduated from yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. i drive a bmw. i grew up in manhattan. i plan to go to business school next year.

participant_2.name: Lila Hargrove
participant_2.personality: Creative and quirky, often lost in her thoughts. She enjoys solitude and has a unique perspective on life, which reflects in her gaming content.
participant_2.background: i'm a famous twitch streamer. i am a recluse. i helped design the game starcraft. i'm working on a building a robot to be my body double. i have an allergy to water.
